title: 做完Management Consulting, 你問我答

replies.msg:
做左兩年已經辭職, 等走人, 見冇咩人post 過點入行就出下post等人了解一下

PS: 由於人在羅馬, 不定時上水回post
點入行
可唔可以簡單介紹下點樣入行，係咪要學校勁gpa高？好似好少請fg
MBB之一

quote.msg: 可唔可以簡單介紹下點樣入行，係咪要學校勁gpa高？好似好少請fg

replies.msg: 搭單問

quote.msg: 點入行

replies.msg:
如果fg, 你gpa 要3.5以上, 科目不限, 基本咩背景都有, 見過有人學位係英國文學
GPA只係for interview chance, 有phone call就唔洗再睇成績

如果出左黎做, MBB有referral容易d有interview, 非3大既M-size consulting firm每年都會有大型recruitment day, 搵下efinancialcareers

quote.msg: 可唔可以簡單介紹下點樣入行，係咪要學校勁gpa高？好似好少請fg

replies.msg: 我入左兩年平均每年3個本地fg, 我出左黎做幾年後有人refer我先入去

quote.msg: MBB之一

replies.msg: 人往高處走, 佢加唔到我要既人工咪走 又唔係要賣命俾佢

平均每日工時幾長？
多數人走嘅話會去邊？PE？
做啲咩？係咪 restructuring，re-engineering 個啲？

quote.msg:
平均每日工時幾長？
多數人走嘅話會去邊？PE？

replies.msg:
人地我唔知, 我自己就平均每個禮拜65-70 hr

好睇你接到咩project, 同partner chur唔chur

好多人走去PE/VC/hedge fund
Mbb 第幾年年薪過一M
考qualifications?主要要求咩skill sets?programming ?
見過啲咩黑暗嘢？

quote.msg: 做啲咩？係咪 restructuring，re-engineering 個啲？

replies.msg:
consulting 有好幾種
我認識既有advisory, HR, IT 同strategy, 如果有更多請其他師兄補充

我做strategy consultation, 基本係幫公司(client)諗未來2-3年既發展, 咩方向, 有咩潛在競爭(需要M&A與否), 同最重要P&L
用左幾耐prep case interview? prep嘅時候用邊d resources多？

quote.msg: Mbb 第幾年年薪過一M

replies.msg:
fg入計?定跳入黎計?

實數我唔係HR我唔知, 但每年內部base人工加既幅度有雙位數
另外香港mbb入行好似3x K? 要做到年薪1mm通常要幾耐？

quote.msg: 考qualifications?主要要求咩skill sets?programming ?

replies.msg: analytical skills (R, python)會有著數, 基本上consultant既要求係Research, Research同Research(好重要所以要講3次)

我用舊公司d pitching deck

replies.msg:
1. 30k-40k
2. Performance-based bonus means a lot, as well as a cash bonus on top as a % of your combined pay (base + performance bonus). so around 3 years, you will get more than 1mil annually

replies.msg:
That's my experience:
1. problem solving test (5 cases inside) via online
2. hr called and told me I should prepare a case interview on XYZ
3. Case interview (Board interview), go back for an interview with slides prepared on the other day after I received hr call
4. Met partner about some behavioural question
5. Offer received

quote.msg: 工程狗，做開consultant，除左technical design有urban/infrastructure planning同project management經驗，轉management consultant有冇優勢？（見mbb既industries有infrastructure)

replies.msg:
有, 做過PM係有著數, 你報之前不妨執執CV, 強調自己project expensive 同decision making 既involvement

我都係engine 出身

工程狗，做開consultant，除左technical design有urban/infrastructure planning同project management經驗，轉management consultant有冇優勢？（見mbb既industries有infrastructure)

quote.msg: 其實你之前做過IBD, 點解唔做番IBD既，package至少double ..

replies.msg:
冇咩特別原因 唔鐘意做IBD, 我做左3年咪出左去做startup
之後做做下startup又發覺consulting 好似幾好玩咪去左做

我個人認為如果對個行業冇熱誠同衝勁係好應該起身讓位, 而且我唔會做得長
hey師兄😛我起歐洲office做緊但係税太高想番嚟，想問下glassdoor人工準唔準(associate 7萬/月+~20萬bonus, manager 10萬/月)? 同埋你話黑暗，講緊香港office辦公室政治定普遍公司文化？萬分感謝🙏🏻
同起香港轉去PE/In house難唔難 (講緊起香港唔去大陸嘅話)
人工加幅如何?

quote.msg: hey師兄😛我起歐洲office做緊但係税太高想番嚟，想問下glassdoor人工準唔準(associate 7萬/月+~20萬bonus, manager 10萬/月)? 同埋你話黑暗，講緊香港office辦公室政治定普遍公司文化？萬分感謝🙏🏻

oh like how feedbacks from colleagues affect whether you get promoted or not? But from how i felt, at least in my office, the opinion is pretty equitable? Not so in hk office?

Ah i expected a higher salary. Is that the starting salary for associate (since in my office, salary increases by around 10000 HKD/month every year)? Is the bonus and manager’s salary correct tho? Many thanks!
Do you mind if we chat in tg (@strawberrybanana) for a bit please? Dont wanna spam the post

quote.msg: oh like how feedbacks from colleagues affect whether you get promoted or not? But from how i felt, at least in my office, the opinion is pretty equitable? Not so in hk office?

replies.msg:
HK office is more aggressive in my feelings, I have been in HK, AUS and Europe offices. People are nice in general but still quite competitive.
maybe I get used to the startup environment before.

quote.msg: 樓主咩engine 出身？ Industrial and Systems eng ?

replies.msg:
重點唔係咩engine出身, 而係你點sell你自己, 執完cv針對性寫下自己relevant 既role同duty, 再練interview, prep好啲問題, generic 或specific啲既rocket questions.

你當見工同做戲一樣, show your passion and never hesitate to answer any questions

無論你見ibd或consulting 或其他mt/gt program都一樣

Thanks ching, 想問問advisory 自知入唔到big 4，細firm 個scope or jd 有咩先係practical valuable skill??

replies.msg:
Project experience , research experience (即係BA) 好重要
你識research 知道有咩渠道揾到自己要既資料你已經贏左個offer
e. g. 我如果想知道香港有幾多single director /sole proprietor 既注冊公司, 佔既比率, 你邊到揾到呢粒數俾我？ hints: hkir冇

Exposure, presentation skill, analytical mindset, work independently etc

replies.msg:
名牌既野好多時都係吹出黎, 唔通我話我係Google 做adsense AM同我講係Google 做machine learning既engineer 又一樣咩, 雖然大家都係話自己做Google

Consultants 更甚啦, 你是旦捉一個AP/Partner 出黎唔通佢地又會識execution

反而我想知你請佢地做咩post
Consultants 唔係萬能插, 擺錯係錯位置, 佢地只會比垃圾更垃圾

replies.msg:
樓主想問多少少關於big4 Consulting ge 睇法
依家係其中一間既Consulting department做緊
Operation, Tech, M&A ge project都做過
但因為大學BBA(IS), 所以主要發展方向會係番tech
但依家仲考慮緊自己岩唔岩係big4做呢行

一黎自己覺得自己無論人脈, language, exposure 等等既野都未夠top 可以跳到去MBB

二黎出路問題都諗緊好耐，因為我主要做d客都係non-fs，出路窄左好多，如果行tech做落去會唔會最後得番出面d公司既IT狗？

三黎話就話Consulting聽落係神工，以前讀書時都知even big4既consulting department都要first hon 過五關斬六將先入到。但依家exp hire入到去感覺好似無乜特別，人工又同Audit一樣(依家Audit已經請一堆恆大仔個d)，感覺上自己搵唔到個value係邊咁。
